Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that no such incident took place or was reported.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the shortstop laid on his back during the playing of the national anthem while wearing a shirt reading "Kill the NRA," which did not happen.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no evidence or report of the incident.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the incident occurred based on false information.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim is a fabrication created by a satirical website.
